text: Hagi Josefena, hanave'amo'a agonesa ve bulimakamofo hanavemo'ma hiaza hugahie. Hagi hanave'amo'a, afi' ve bulimakao afu'mofo pazive'agna huno hanavenentake hugahie. Agra ha' vahe'aramina zamavaririsige'za mopa atumparega vnageno, Efraemi naga'mo'za 10 tauseni'a agatere'za manisageno, Manase naga'mo'za 1 tauseni'a agatere'za manigahaze.
